author: jeremias
msg: Enabled debug info because we're in development here. IMO debug info should only (if at all) be disabled in a final release.

author: jeremias
msg: I got serialization errors during build so I rebuilt buildtools.jar.

author: jeremias
msg: Configuration now has two static getter methods returning a baseURL and a fontBaseURL. Those two values can be a filename or a URL.

I've changed quite a few places where Strings were used to reference a file to URLs. The whole stuff should now be more consistent and less error prone. It uses the URLBuilder class I've submitted earlier.
